Scrum RACI Matrix

This interactive tool maps Scrum responsibilities using a RACI matrix. Click on any RACI indicator to see the corresponding section of the Scrum Guide.

RACI Matrix

Task Developer PO SM
Produce Definition of Done
Create an Increment I I
Create a plan for the Sprint, the Sprint Backlog I I
Instilling quality by adhering to a Definition of Done I I
Adapting their plan each day toward the Sprint Goal I I
Holding each other accountable as professionals - -
Maximizing the value of the product I
Effective Product Backlog management I I
Establishing Scrum as defined in the Scrum Guide I I
The Scrum Team's effectiveness

RACI Legend

  • R - Responsible: Does the work
  • A - Accountable: Ensures completion
  • C - Consulted: Provides input
  • I - Informed: Kept up-to-date

Scrum Guide Reference

Click any RACI indicator in the matrix to see the corresponding Scrum Guide section.
